titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for the clothiers of Suffoke, Norffolke, and Essex
Proclamations. 1601-02-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint is from colophon; year is given according to Lady Day dating.
